title: Scalable Permutation Invariant Multi-Output Gaussian Processes for Cancer Drug Response
details: L Rønneberg, V Lalchand - NeurIPS 2024 Workshop on Bayesian Decision …
abstract: Dose-response prediction in cancer is a critical step to assessing the efficacy of drug combinations on cancer cell-lines. The efficacy of a pair of drugs can be expressively modelled through a dose-response surface which outputs the viability score across a …
